Alexander N. Wilson

Teaching

Past courses:

  • Oberlin Spring 2025: Math 220 Discrete Math
  • Oberlin Spring 2025: Math 327 Group Theory
  • Oberlin Fall 2024: Math 133 Calculus I
  • Oberlin Spring 2024: Math 133 Calculus I
  • Oberlin Fall 2023: Math 220 (Section 03) Discrete Mathematics

  • Dartmouth Fall 2022: Math 22 Linear Algebra with Applications
  • Dartmouth Fall 2021: Math 3 Calculus
  • Dartmouth Fall 2020: Math 1 Calculus with Algebra

Teaching Tools:

Frequency Analysis Tool
A frequency analysis tool for substitution ciphers developed for use in the 2020 Summer Math Camp at Dartmouth
L-R Rule
An interactive example of Remmel and Whitney's combinatorial rule for expanding the product of Schur functions
Mystery Set Operation
A tool for students to experiment with a set operation by providing two sets to test.
This site was last updated on July 20, 2025. It was created using Jekyll with interactive components running on p5.js.
